scripts.start:local: dotenv -e env/local.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=local nest start --watch
scripts.start:local:debug: dotenv -e env/local.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=local nest start --debug --watch
scripts.start:staging: dotenv -e env/staging.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node dist/main
scripts.start:production: dotenv -e env/prod.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/main
scripts.database:migration:generate:local: dotenv -e env/local.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=local npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:generate
scripts.database:migration:generate:staging: dotenv -e env/staging.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:generate
scripts.database:migration:generate:production: dotenv -e env/prod.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:generate
scripts.database:migration:run:local: dotenv -e env/local.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=local npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.database:migration:run:staging: dotenv -e env/staging.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.database:migration:run:production: dotenv -e env/prod.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.database:migration:revert:local: dotenv -e env/local.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=local npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:revert
scripts.database:migration:revert:staging: dotenv -e env/staging.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:revert
scripts.database:migration:revert:production: dotenv -e env/prod.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:revert
scripts.database:migration:status:local: dotenv -e env/local.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=local npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:show
scripts.database:migration:status:staging: dotenv -e env/staging.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:show
scripts.database:migration:status:production: dotenv -e env/prod.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run database:typeorm -- -d src/database/data-source.ts migration:show
scripts.database:seed: dotenv -e env/local.env -- cross-env NODE_ENV=local ts-node src/database/seeds/run-seed.ts
